title: Urban: I Got a Space-Time Mailbox and I Can Write to My Past Self - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Historical   Mystery   Romance   Sci-fi
tags: Early Romance   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Poor to Rich   Time Travel
author: 白河
description: One day, Lin Xian got a mysterious space-time mailbox through which he could write to the past. then. [Dear me yesterday, this lottery number is xxx...] I woke up with a lottery ticket in my pocket and won the first prize! [Dear me the day before yesterday, two little girls fell into the water, please save them. When I woke up, TV reporters, flowers, and pennants blocked the way towards Lin Xian's home!>
